4th Annual MR2 A Finals MORNING LINE
Monster Rancher Metropolis: The Coliseum (Public Monster Rancher Tournaments): Legend Cup! Archive: MR2 Tournaments: 4th Annual MR2 A Finals MORNING LINE
By Strunks on Saturday, November 6, 2004 - 11:15 am:

It's been 3 years and quite possibly the last portion of the A finals from Fenrick's 4x4 Monster Madness©. Even if you aren't entered in this, it's still a classic tournament that anyone can enjoy. I encourage anyone who hasn't seen a MR2 A Class Tournament or even Final, be sure to see this.

I've tried my best to be an entrant in every chance I could get once it was brought to everyone's attention. And in the 4th installment, I am.

Getting down to the basics:
MonsterTrainerBreedOdds
svenStrunksCelious3-2
GailRedHareFrozenGaboo2-1
PowerhouseHellraiser83Battlerocks5-2
LuffyScaled HareGoGators4-1


Of course, I have a reason for placing sven at the highest besides the fact that I raised him. It's been shown that sven hits, and he hits hard. He's the crowd favorite as well as in all lowercases. Battling it out in the best bracket with SonOfTheSun, Vladimir, and Project Blue, sven has earned top nods. sven edges out Gail by a few due to the tech array provided. I remember quite well trying to get Ninja Kick myself, dealing with Cyclone. I also lost with my prized Gaboo, all thanks to Cyclone. He still has the same stat layout as sven, which doesn't bring him down completely in my prediction. If anything, I predict that it will come down to these two Heavyweights at the end. Powerhouse is a monster I'm aware of completely. I've seen him back a year or two ago from Hellraiser, and I know he can hurt sven. Problem is, 90% of the time he's getting KO'd himself. Of course, that's only sven...Gail can dish it out too, and I'm sure it'll be an even match between them. And those techs sure are scary. No Cyclone? Oops, Brow Smash. Hurts like the dickens. Lastly, Luffy is the wild card of the finals. He won in a tournament of chumps, and is playing with the champs. It's his chance to pop a few caps, and by all means he could with his techs. GG went ahead and went for a powerhouse selection. I also heard he's KO'd sven in practice sessions. Mepersoner will say Hares rule, but then again, he's not in the finals! Burnnnn.

In conclusion, if we ever have another LC event after this, it probably won't amount to as much fun as this. A Class, IMO, is where the most fun is at. It's why we have had 4 so far. Easiest to raise, most fun to watch.


To those who made A class what it is, Lisa, PT, Torey, Mepersoner, Hengersrock, Hellraiser83, Infernus, Velo, Slapshotz, GG, CHB, RedHare, IJ, Newblish, Squee, Kurasu, and even Richard Ryley for destroying the competition, Tecmo style (Rygar) -- It was loads of fun, and you all rock.


ALL HAIL FENRICK!
ALL HAIL MONSTER RANCHER!

By Infernus on Saturday, November 6, 2004 - 01:20 pm:

This is tonight...ouch. I have to go to a hockey game. Anyway, I'm sure sven has this. Gail and Powerhouse can hold their own, and Luffy is full of surprises, but sven is set up just right. That's not to say something might happen. Good luck to all of you!
